scripts.docker:remove: docker stop mindforge-backend 2>nul || echo Not running && docker rm -f mindforge-backend 2>nul || echo Not found
scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:remove && docker build --no-cache -t mindforge-backend .
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:remove && docker run -d --name mindforge-backend -p 4000:4000 --env-file .env mindforge-backend
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop mindforge-backend 2>nul || echo Not running && docker rm mindforge-backend 2>nul || echo Not found
